Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2014 06:14PM Day wrote: Dear Beese .     Thank you so  much for your reply , you are correct on all that you said i was extreamly worried . I will follow up with Doctor Tomorow and thank you for pointing out what reports to ask for and copies to obtain . Again thank you for putting my mind at rest . I'm looking after a very dear friend with Stage 4 breast cancer . I go down for all her appotments in LA . She is doing really well to treatment but a never ending roller coaster for her . I think it was a shock to me to get a recall on my Mamo as have gone since I was 40 years old . I just turned 49 . I feel the gentleman who read my Untrasound was insensitive and extreamly cold which threw for a loop with worry . Forward with a cure ♥     Thanks DAY
Posts.Title: Diagnostic Mammogram & U/S tomorrow!! shelle3 AnxietyAnne

Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2014 04:59PM Day wrote: I'm in the same boat here , I had a recall on my mamogram last week for further mamograme and ultra sound . I had the mamo and ultra sound completed last Tuesday . No cancer come back in 6 months . Confused and worried . I'm seeing my regular doctor Tomorow Tuesday 21 January to review report . Otherwise I feel I'm reading every breast cancer website . The gentleman who read my ultrasound had zero bed side manner and told me that it wasn't cancer come back in 6 months and walked out the room . I just burst into tears !!! My mother had breast cancer 4 years ago and is cancer free.  Thinking of you .
Posts.Title: Diagnostic Mammogram & U/S tomorrow!! shelle3 AnxietyAnne

Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2014 02:22PM Day wrote: I saw my regular doctor yesterday and got reports back from mamo and Untrasound .. Jan  14 . Extreamly dence breast tissue BI- Rads 3 . Probably benign finding on left breast . No discrete cystic masses identified . No abnormal shadowing . Follow up in 6 months .. ..... I should be extreamly grateful which I am . I still want to see a  breast cancer surgeon . My regular doctor detected cysts in both breast .  As my Mum had breast cancer at 62 years of age . I just turned 49 . I always say follow your gut instinks .. Thank you this has been a great page to read and my prays are with you all .
